message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.HC 

The paper discusses the challenges of integrating safety and security assurance for complex systems, which is a common problem in the field of cybersecurity (cs.CR). The paper also proposes a framework for co-assurance, which involves the coordination of different processes and expertise, making it relevant to software engineering (cs.SE) and systems and control (cs.SY). The paper also mentions the use of synchronisation activities, which could involve artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
